****************************************************************** Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Issue Reported: {!Case.Description}
Hello,
We wanted to update you on a recent issue you reported regarding cart discount rules. The discount Buy X units in (Category A), get Y additional units in the same category free wasn't discounting items when the minimum was 3 units and 2 products from the same category were set to a quantity of 2. This issue has been addressed by our development team and the fix has been rolled out to all stores.
If you have any questions or need further assistance, please let us know.
Thank you,
BigCommerce Support http://support.bigcommerce.com/contact
